name: LitMan Pubic Hair WIP
description:
Random Public Hair for Human NPC. Also to choose for Player on Character Creation.

Female - 6 Styles.
Male - 3 Styles.

Mod respects Gameplay Nudity settings - None, Partial or Full. You need to set Gameplay Nudity settings accordingly.

Best used with "LitMan All Nude" or "LitMan Only Nude Women".

Curently Work in Progress. So expect bugs and often updates.

Support Discord Chanel: https://discord.gg/RjCVRWm

If you like my Mods feel free to Donate on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis. Or become a Patron on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/kasperaitis.
